actions.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas S. Foley, a Representative from the State of Washington, Speaker; and Donnald K. Anderson, a citizen of the State of California, Clerk of the House of Representatives of the One Hundred Third Congress.

summary.text: Instructs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to inform the President that Thomas S. Foley has been elected Speaker of the House of Representatives and that Donnald K. Anderson has been elected Clerk.

titles.title: Authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas S. Foley, a Representative from the State of Washington, Speaker; and Donnald K. Anderson, a citizen of the State of California, Clerk of the House of Representatives of the One Hundred Third Congress.
